scripts.dev:h5: lerna exec --scope example -- npm run dev:h5
scripts.build: npm run build:form && npm run build:modal && npm run build:check-radio
scripts.build:form: lerna exec --scope carefree-taro-form  -- npm run build
scripts.watch:form: lerna exec --scope carefree-taro-form  -- npm run watch
scripts.build:modal: lerna exec --scope carefree-taro-modal -- npm run build
scripts.watch:modal: lerna exec --scope carefree-taro-modal  -- npm run watch
scripts.build:check-radio: lerna exec --scope carefree-taro-check-radio -- npm run build
scripts.watch:check-radio: lerna exec --scope carefree-taro-check-radio  -- npm run watch
scripts.deploy: npm run docs:build && npm run docs:deploy
